{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20671v1", "title": "A duality for minimal surfaces in the Heisenberg group", "summary": "We introduce and study the notion of a transformation surface associated with
a nowhere-vertical minimal surface in the three-dimensional Heisenberg group,
and prove its minimality and duality. Furthermore, by using the logarithmic
derivative of the moving frame with respect to the spectral parameter, we
derive the Sym formula for the dual minimal surface.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG", "published": "2025-04-29T11:54:50Z"}
